author: wiifan55
body: The restricted access is a result of liquidity issues by the app brokers, not pressure from the hedge funds. I mean, sure there's no real way to disprove the latter isn't at play too. But liquidity offers a perfectly logical explanation for the restricted access. It's like the old saying goes: if you hear hooves when in North America, think horse, not zebra.

author: KafkasVapePen
body:
> It's like the old saying goes: if you hear hooves when in North America, think horse, not zebra.

Never heard this before but I like it as much as WSB likes GME. I'm adding it to my repertoire.

author: jleek21
body: I did ok. I made about 12% in about three weeks using a CC ZEBRA with CVS last year. I haven’t traded CVS since then.
